title: Hour 1 - Albert Breer
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Albert Breer
description:
Dan reacts to Deshaun Watson's 6-game suspension. NFL Reporter Albert Breer joins the show to discuss Watson's suspension and give the latest around NFL training camps.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
